name: Copy Quantum Dim Data to Staging

activities.name: Copy Quantum SYS_COMPANIES Table to Staging

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT GEO_AUTO_KEY
, GEO_CODE
, DESCRIPTION
, SDF_GEO_001
FROM TESTENV.GEO_CODES

SELECT COC_AUTO_KEY
, CODE
, COUNTRY_NAME
FROM TESTENV.COUNTRY_CODES

dependsOn.activity: Copy Quantum SYS_COMPANIES Table to Staging

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT DIV_AUTO_KEY
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, SDF_DIV_001
, DIVISION_NAME
FROM TESTENV.DIVISION

SELECT GLS_AUTO_KEY
, SEGMENT_NUMBER
, ACCOUNT
, DESCRIPTION
, ACCOUNT_TYPE
, ACCOUNT_TYPE_DESC
, SDF_GLS_002
FROM TESTENV.GL_SEGMENT

SELECT GAC_AUTO_KEY
, GAC_PARENT
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, ACCOUNT_TYPE
, SEQ
, DESCRIPTION
, SDF_GAC_001
, COSTOFGOODS_FLAG
, OTHER_INCOME_FLAG
, OTHER_EXPENSE_FLAG
FROM TESTENV.GL_ACCT_CAT

SELECT DPT_AUTO_KEY
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, DIV_AUTO_KEY
, GLS_AUTO_KEY
, DEPT_NAME
, SDF_DPT_001
FROM TESTENV.DEPARTMENT

SELECT WOK_AUTO_KEY
, DESCRIPTION
, SDF_WOK_003
, SDF_WOK_001
, SDF_WOK_002
, BILLING_RATE
FROM TESTENV.WO_SKILLS

SELECT GLA_AUTO_KEY
, ACCOUNT_NUMBER
, ACCOUNT_TYPE_DESC
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, GAC_AUTO_KEY
, DESCRIPTION
, GLS_AUTO_KEY0
, GLS_AUTO_KEY1
, GLS_AUTO_KEY2
, GLS_AUTO_KEY3
, GLS_AUTO_KEY4
, LEDGER
, SEQ
, BUDGETED
, COSTOFGOODS_FLAG
, ALLOW_ENTRY
, REPLACEABLE
, OTHER_INCOME_FLAG
, OTHER_EXPENSE_FLAG
, CONTROL_ACCOUNT_FLAG
FROM TESTENV.GL_ACCOUNT

SELECT GLJ_AUTO_KEY
, CODE
, DESCRIPTION
FROM TESTENV.GL_JOURNAL

SELECT GLD_AUTO_KEY
, GLJ_AUTO_KEY
, GLA_AUTO_KEY
, CODE
, DESCRIPTION
FROM TESTENV.GL_DISTRIBUTION

SELECT GLF_AUTO_KEY
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, DESCRIPTION
FROM TESTENV.GL_FISCAL

SELECT GLP_AUTO_KEY
, GLF_AUTO_KEY
, FISCAL_START
, FISCAL_END
, GLP_FORWARD
, GLP_LAST
, IS_ACTIVE
, BUDGET_PERIOD
, FYE_PERIOD
FROM TESTENV.GL_PERIOD

SELECT CMP_AUTO_KEY
, COMPANY_CODE
, COMPANY_NAME
, COMPANY_ABBREV
, ADDRESS1
, ADDRESS2
, ADDRESS3
, CITY
, STATE
, ZIP_CODE
, COUNTRY
, SHIP_ADDRESS1
, SHIP_ADDRESS2
, SHIP_ADDRESS3
, SHIP_CITY
, SHIP_STATE
, SHIP_ZIP_CODE
, SHIP_COUNTRY
, SITE_CODE
, PHONE_NUMBER
, ALT_PHONE_NUMBER
, CUSTOMER_FLAG
, VENDOR_FLAG
FROM TESTENV.COMPANIES

SELECT SYSUR_AUTO_KEY
, EMPLOYEE_CODE
, USER_NAME
, USER_ID
, FIRST_NAME
, MIDDLE_NAME
, LAST_NAME
, EMAIL_ADDRESS
, START_DATE
, END_DATE
, BIRTH_DATE
, WOK_AUTO_KEY
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, GEO_AUTO_KEY
, PHONE_NUMBER
, LICENSE_TYPE
, LICENSE_NUMBER
, SYSUR_TA_SUPER
, OVER_TIME
, CONTRACTOR
, DPT_AUTO_KEY
, CMP_AUTO_KEY
FROM TESTENV.SYS_USERS

SELECT WTP_AUTO_KEY
, SDF_WTP_001
, TASK_TYPE
, DESCRIPTION
, BASE_TYPE
FROM TESTENV.WO_TASK_TYPE

SELECT ID
, SYSUR_AUTO_KEY
, EFFECTIVE_DATE
, RATE
, PERIOD
, VERSION
, DATE_CREATED
, CREATED_BY
, LAST_UPDATED
, UPDATED_BY
FROM MROUPG.SYS_USERS_RATE
WHERE DELETE_DATE IS NULL

SELECT ID
, CODE
, DESCRIPTION
, TYPE
, VERSION
, EXTERNAL_CODE
, SD_PAY_CODE
, SECONDARY_APPROVAL
, ABSENCE
, REQUIRES_ACCRUAL
, ACTIVE
FROM MROUPG.TIME_CODE

SELECT up.URP_AUTO_KEY
, up.SYSUR_AUTO_KEY
, up.START_DATE
, up.END_DATE
, p.POSITION_CODE
, eup.LABOR_CLASS
, eup.WOK_AUTO_KEY
, eup.DPT_AUTO_KEY
, eup.SDF_SYSUR_001
, vet.CODE
, eup.DIRECT
, eup.OVERTIME
, eup.CONTRACTOR
, eup.EXEMPT
, eup.SHIFT_DIFF
, eup.PAID_HOLIDAY
, eup.INCLUDE_HEAD_COUNT
FROM TESTENV.USER_POSITIONS up
JOIN TESTENV.POSITION_CODES p
ON up.PSC_AUTO_KEY = p.PSC_AUTO_KEY
JOIN MROUPG.EXT_USER_POSITIONS eup
ON up.URP_AUTO_KEY = eup.URP_AUTO_KEY
LEFT OUTER JOIN MROUPG.VENDOR_EMPLOYEE_TYPES vet
ON eup.VENDOR_EMPLOYEE_TYPE = vet.ID
